mapper.select: SELECT id, article_id, banner, title, subtitle, tags, text, highlight_positions, user_id, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted FROM article_collect WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, article_id, banner, title, subtitle, tags, text, highlight_positions, user_id, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted FROM article_collect WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, article_id, banner, title, subtitle, tags, text, highlight_positions, user_id, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted FROM article_collect WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article_collect (article_id, banner, title, subtitle, tags, text, highlight_positions, user_id) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{banner}, #{title}, #{subtitle}, #{tags}, #{text}, #{highlightPositions}, #{userId})
